# Support for NET-Shell

Thank you for using NET-Shell! Here is how you can get help.

## ‚ùì FAQ
**Q: Why does the flood fail immediately?** A: Ensure you have an active internet connection and that the URL includes `http://` or `https://`.

**Q: Does this work on Windows?** A: Yes. Run `python setup.py` to handle Windows-specific virtual environment paths.

## üõ†Ô∏è Troubleshooting
* **ModuleNotFoundError**: Run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
* **DNS Resolution Error**: Check if the target site is down or if your local DNS is blocked.

## üí¨ Contact & Community
* **Issues**: For bugs and features, use the [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/SoftBridge-Labs/NET-Shell/issues).
* **Discussions**: For general "how-to" questions, use the [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/SoftBridge-Labs/NET-Shell/discussions) tab.
